name: Kbengine cocos2dx demo
tagline: A cocos2dx demo for mmo game engine KBE
body:
### Welcome to KBEngine-cocos2dx demo.
This project will implement a demo based on cocos2dx and KBE server. one front, one backend, i am bridge. bless i have enough time to show how to develop a light multiply network based demo. 
```
$ git clone git://github.com/cnsoft/kbengine_cocos2dx_demo.git kbe_cocos2dx_demo
$ git submodule update --init --recursive
```

### What's KBE engine?

KBEngine is designed of MMO RPG game server engine. it is excited for me since i am working on bigworld for sereral years.i want to reuse my experiences. so i create this project, i hope you guys like it.

### Authors and Contributors
 In 2008, Tom Chen (@cnsoft) registered account GitHub. 2014, i create first open source project.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this project? Check out the documentation or contact cnsoft#gmail.com . and when i have time , i â€™ll help you sort it out.
